name: Gravity's Edge
description:
This is our attempt at making an FPS game for the 7DFPS jam! We had very limited time to dedicate to this but we did the best we could!

Controls:

Mouse to Aim, Left BTN to Shoot

Esc to Pause and Arrows/Mouse to Navigate

------------------------------------------------

In this FPS game, you find yourself in a world where the earth has been destroyed by a powerful force that ended up distorting gravity.

The only remaining pieces of land are floating in the air, you must use a gravity-powered device to jump between these pieces of land and fight off dark creatures that lurk on the floating pieces of land. 

These creatures are the remnants of the earth's inhabitants, mutated by the destruction of the world. Make sure to avoid falling off into the void.
